text:
Palo Alto, CA

imo.im FULL TIME and INTERN Software Engineers

Based in Palo Alto, imo is a fast growing startup founded and funded by one of the first 10 employees at Google. We’re building products that help millions of people around the world connect with their friends and make new friends. We’re a closely-knit team made up mostly of engineers including top TopCoders, ACM ICPC World Finalists and medalists of the International Olympiads in Informatics. Our team is highly motivated, hardworking and loves to solve problems. At imo, you will be challenged and inspired daily.

Apply at http://imo.im/jobs
